name: Surpoint
description:
Surpoint is a game where is the only purpose - don't let any zombie to level up 10th level. 

This lonely island was the only hope for last survivors. Humanity invented cloning and created undying person, so they could grow a giant human's army... but zombies found them. Now it's a gun race, who would win? 

Short rules:  Zombie eats 3 citizens - zombie level up.  Zombie eats 1 player - zombie level up. Dying gives you money for upgrades. Controls: Team:
  • Programmer - BaggySHH
  • Artist - Derrick Moore
  • Composer - Barkenergia
Thanks Kenney for free assets.
